attributes.action: let Scotland become independent with immediate effect and become self financed immediately!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why i want Scotland to become independent immediately is as a result of the growing anti english feeling being made through the Scottish media comments sections from Scottish readers/nationals. Also there is now an SNP minority govt in Scotland with anti english policies!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
